title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now selectboth P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, Open/Close project should either be available or not be enabled.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, Open/Close project is always available and enabled.
SR: Ensure that the availability and enabled status of Open/Close project is consistent when selecting both P1 and P2.
